product_summary: Pentest Copilot by BugBase is a cloud-based penetration testing tool that helps organizations identify and mitigate security vulnerabilities. It provides a comprehensive suite of features, including automated scanning, manual testing, and reporting.
product_cons: May require additional training for effective use
Not all features are included in the basic plan
False positives can be an issue

product_usecases.details: Pentest Copilot can be used to identify and assess vulnerabilities in web applications, networks, and systems.
Pentest Copilot can be used to conduct penetration tests to simulate real-world attacks and identify potential security breaches.
Pentest Copilot can be used to ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations, such as PCI DSS, HIPAA, and ISO 27001.
Pentest Copilot can be used to perform security audits to assess the overall security posture of an organization.
Pentest Copilot can be used to assess the security of cloud environments and identify vulnerabilities in cloud infrastructure and applications.

product_toolfor.details: Pentest Copilot is designed for security professionals who need to conduct penetration tests, vulnerability assessments, and security audits.
Pentest Copilot can help IT auditors to assess the compliance of IT systems and networks with industry standards and regulations.
Pentest Copilot can help application developers to identify and fix security vulnerabilities in their applications.
Pentest Copilot can help system administrators to harden systems and networks against security threats.
Pentest Copilot can help security consultants to provide value-added services to their clients.

product_pricing: Pricing for Pentest Copilot starts at $99 per month for the basic plan, which includes automated scanning and manual testing. The professional plan costs $299 per month and includes additional features such as compliance reporting and integration with other security tools.
